about_the_game:
You control a Qubit, an Artificially Intelligent Quantum Bit, deep within a Learning Interface of a Quantum Computer, completing Trials of intelligence, speed, and patience.

The Qubit is not alone.


Encounter the Sage, a Superintelligent, all knowing entity who has mastered the Infinite, and is now here to guide you.


Talk with various employees of Bree Inc, a Corporation that will harness the power of AI no matter the cost, through Distortions in the Learning Interface.

The Qubit is frail.

The Trials are not a pleasant place for the Qubit, and death is always around. From Black Holes to Shooters, Lasers and Bombs, to the Walls that surround the Trials themselves, hazards are everywhere.

Features

  • A Story Mode with many Trials, twists and turns, and multiple endings.
  • An Arcade Mode to hone your skills and get the best times on the global Steam Leaderboard.
detailed_description:
You control a Qubit, an Artificially Intelligent Quantum Bit, deep within a Learning Interface of a Quantum Computer, completing Trials of intelligence, speed, and patience.

The Qubit is not alone.


Encounter the Sage, a Superintelligent, all knowing entity who has mastered the Infinite, and is now here to guide you.


Talk with various employees of Bree Inc, a Corporation that will harness the power of AI no matter the cost, through Distortions in the Learning Interface.

The Qubit is frail.

The Trials are not a pleasant place for the Qubit, and death is always around. From Black Holes to Shooters, Lasers and Bombs, to the Walls that surround the Trials themselves, hazards are everywhere.

Features

  • A Story Mode with many Trials, twists and turns, and multiple endings.
  • An Arcade Mode to hone your skills and get the best times on the global Steam Leaderboard.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04+
  • Processor: 1.6GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+ Capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04+
  • Processor: 2.5GHz Multi Core
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+ Capable
  • Storage: 1024 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: A Frail Qubit

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 1.6GHz Dual Core
  • Memory: 256 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3.3+ Capable
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10
  • Processor: 2.5GHz Multi Core

short_description: You control an Artifically Intelligent Quantum Bit (Qubit) completing mysterious Trials. Juggle being controlled by a Superintelligent master of the Infinite and employees of a large, ill-intentioned Corporation while reckoning with the nature of your reality.
